faqs.title: Is PlasBit Card a credit or debit card?
text: PlasBit Visa Card is a prepaid card. Broadly speaking, prepaid cards are the same as debit cards. The difference is that debit cards are linked to your bank account,but prepaid cards need to be topped up. In our case, you can top up using only cryptocurrency from your plasbit wallet.

faqs.title: How do I apply for PlasBit Visa Card?
text: To do so, first sign up for a PlasBit.com account and open your  own secured wallet. Next, go to the ‘Wallet’ tab in the dashboard and deposit crypto into your Wallet.
After, go to the ‘Cards’ tab in the dashboard, Choose the card tier you’re applying for, tap the ‘Get this Card’ button and follow the on-screen instructions.
Finally, pay for the card from your wallet balance.
Now, all you need to do is to wait for us to notify you when your card has being approved!

faqs.title: How do I Top-Up my card?
text: You can top up your card using your crypto from your PlasBit  Wallet. Go to the ‘Cards’ tab, tap ‘Funding’, and select your preferred crypto wallet to fund your card from.

faqs.title: How long does shipping take?
text: It typically takes 10 to 14 business days for EU/EEA addresses and up to 4 weeks for APAC addresses.

faqs.title: How do I pay using crypto?
text: Just tap, swipe, or use pin & chip with your PlasBit Visa Card.  We take care of the crypto to fiat conversion for you automatically when you pay at any merchant.

faqs.title: Which exchange rate will you use?
text: We have competitive exchange rates for both fiat and cryptocurrencies.  The exact rates depend on your jurisdiction and card tier. You can read all these details in the PlasBit Visa Card Terms and Conditions when you apply for your card.

faqs.title: Are there any fees I should be aware of?
text: Information about fees and limits (i.e.ATM withdrawals, interbank exchange rates, top-ups, etc.) can be found in the ‘Fees & Limits’ section under in the Card page comparison table. Fees vary by card tier, so be sure you’re checking the correct one.

faqs.title: With which currencies I can load my card?
text: PlasBit debit card is denominated in USD/EURO and can be loaded with the cardholders’ PlasBit wallet. To top it up, you can use Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Cardano and USDC that you receive in PlasBit wallet, as the card can only be loaded with cryptocurrency.

section_1.title: What are cookies?
text: Cookies are a standard feature of websites that allow us to store small amounts of data on your computer about your visit to a website. Cookies help the website owner learn which areas of the website are useful and which areas need improvement. Cookies also improve your experience by, for example, remembering your preferences, such as your language preference or login information.

Some cookies are required for technical reasons in order for a website to operate, also known as "Strictly Necessary" cookies. Some cookies allow a website to count visits and traffic sources so the site owner can measure and improve the performance of the site, also known as “Analytics” cookies. Some cookies enable a website owner to serve targeted advertisements, also known as “Targeting” cookies.

section_2.title: What cookies do we use?
text: Our Site uses both first party cookies (which are set by us) and third party cookies (which are set by a server located outside the domain of our Site) for several reasons. The specific types of first and third party cookies served through our Site and the purposes they perform are described in the tables below.

Strictly Necessary Cookies. These are cookies that make our Site function when you take certain actions, whether you are logging in, managing email preferences, or filling out forms. Since they are essential for our Site to function, we cannot turn them off. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the Site will then not work. These cookies do not store any personal data.

title: Never allow someone else access to your PlasBit account.
Letting someone access your account remotely
Sharing your details via email
“Logging in” to any site other than PlasBit.com
Situations where you might be asked to log in via another platform
text: Sometimes, allowing someone access to your account might feel like the quickest way to make a payment. It’s also one of the simplest ways for scammers to get their hands on your money, and go undetected. It’s a breach of your contract with PlasBit, and for good reason.

With your login details, or remote access to your account, scammers can take your balance in seconds, and the money is not easy to retrieve. At PlasBit, security is incredibly important to us, and we have robust procedures going above and beyond what’s asked of us. But despite our house of bricks, the big bad wolf can still walk in and make a mess if the front door is open.
So what situations do you need to look out for, where you might give access to to a scammer, without even realising...

At PlasBit, we will never ask you to download software to access your device, or offer to make a payment for you. Our customer service agents will give clear instructions over the phone, or on email, but will never ask to take control of your device.

There has been a rise in fake customer service scams. This means scammers set-up fake websites and false phone numbers for PlasBit customer support, and use these to dupe customers into thinking they’re speaking to our real support teams. A polite voice on the end of the phone can suggest that the simplest thing is to let them take the reins and download an application or program that lets them move your money via their phone or laptop. Don’t let them convince you.

A real PlasBit customer service agent would never use this method to help you with a payment, and anyone who does ask for access to your device is not legitimate. The real customer support contact details are available on the Help page, when you’re logged into your account.
Giving access to your account to friends and family might feel harmless, but by sharing your details virtually, you are breaching the terms and conditions of your agreement with PlasBit.
If you need help using PlasBit, contact our customer service team who can help guide you through each step of the transaction. We will never ask you to share login details, share your screen.

At PlasBit, we work directly with you to ensure payments arrive where you want, when you want. We don’t use any ‘brokers’ or assistants to help set up or manage your account, as this can all be done easily through our site.

Unfortunately, where financial services use that model, scammers can see it as an opportunity to offer their ‘middle man services’. These services might be disguised as ‘ensuring you have the right currency’, or ‘creating an account on your behalf’ - but the reality is that they’re unnecessary, and could be a front for a scam. You should be especially cautious if any third party asks you to email personal details and information to them, in order to set up an account ‘for you’.

When logging into your PlasBit account, check the URL is “PlasBit.com/login/”, similarly, if you’re asked to log in via a link in an email, make sure this has a @PlasBit.com domain, anything else could be a malicious attempt to access your money.

There’s a small number of cases where you might not log in directly with us. We work with some other major banks and service providers (like Xero, and Monzo) to help you make transfers directly from their apps, or you may use an Open Banking provider (like Emma and Plum) to help manage your money. If you are using a partner service, and it asks you to log in to your Wise account, they’ll always redirect you to
https://www.plasbit.com
to log in to.
You’ll be explicitly asked for permission to give the partner access to this account, and you should only allow access from companies you know and trust.
If you’re struggling with a payment for any reason, visit our
help center
to see how we can assist.

second.title: About us
text: We are happy to go against the grain. We’re not a company that works with only the bottom line in mind. We see the world of cryptocurrency differently And we feel fine with all that.

We’re a team of free-thinking techies, who look at cryptocurrency a little differently. Where other cryptocurrency companies may value profits, we value, well…financial freedom, and the right to liberty. We are not in the pocket of any of the large players. We answer to no one except our IT and developers in the trenches.

Our mantra is: 'Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.' We work like that, because we think it’s the only way to go. We believe that with blockchain  breakthrough technology the cryptocurrency community can reach open financial system that enables the rights of people to control their own labor and property . We believe that as part  of the community we need to hang together, because if we don’t we will hang alone.

At PlasBit, we support and stand behind the Universal Declaration of Human Rights which states that equal and inalienable rights of all members of the human family is the foundation of freedom, justice and peace in the world. All human beings should be treated with decency, kindness and respect.
We’re not just a different kind of cryptocurrency company, we are a cryptocurrency company that together with you, makes a difference increasing economic freedom in the world.

title: We support the cryptocurrency revolution
Steer a new world and help create a better, safer tomorrow.
text: The cryptocurrency world is hybrid and Blockchain technology is rightly considered to be revolutionary. It makes the value chain more reliable and efficient than any conventional approach, especially in the financial world. Executive boards have gotten the message and drive action. New regulations provide more pressure. There’s never been a better time to be a part of the evolution blockchain technology.
Users of various platforms trade their freedom and privacy for convenience and Transactions are no longer an exchange of bearer instruments but modified entries in a tech company’s ledger.
Personal information is demanded and shared rather than protected. For those without identification documents, these systems are inaccessible.

According to the Human Rights Foundation (2020), approximately 4.2 billion people across 93 countries live today under authoritarian regimes. These individuals have little to no ability to push peacefully for reform concerning economic problems such as state corruption, currency debasement, and financial surveillance. Cash is a vital tool of savings and privacy for them. Once it is gone, the nature of whatever replaces it will, in no small way, dictate their freedom.

Bitcoin’s unique combination of open source programmability, permissionlessness, scarcity, censorship resistance, seizure resistance, and decentralization makes it a promising foundation for digital cash, especially for the billions of people unable to lobby their governments to uphold digital freedom and privacy, who may have no other option.
At its core, cryptocurrency is a breakthrough technology  that allows us to build a more free and open financial system that enables the rights of people to control their own labor and property.

title: PlasBit Wallet vs BRD and Coinbase: Which Crypto Wallet is Right for You?
content: Popular crypto exchange Coinbase recently acquired wallet company BRD. We've compared the PlasBit Wallet with the BRD and Coinbase Wallets to help you decide which crypto wallet is right for you and your digital assets.

The PlasBit Wallet is a free crypto wallet with best_in_class security features like 2 factor authentication, pin code, biometric security, and a 12 word seed phrase back up. Integrate multiple wallets like Metamask, Trust Wallet, and Coinbase all in one app. Available as a mobile or desktop app, our wallet is non_custodial. This means that you, and only you, own your keys. Spend crypto with the PlasBit Card (free virtual card) and buy gift cards right in the app or Extension. Buy and swap all of your favorite coins. PlasBit integrates with 1inch, a DEX aggregator dedicated to finding the best crypto prices on the most popular cryptocurrencies. An intuitive, simple design allows crypto pros and novices alike to take control of their assets with ease.

The PlasBit Wallet is a great option for seasoned crypto enthusiasts as well as beginners. It's features make it ideal if you want to manage assets across multiple wallets (especially Coinbase Exchange's custodial wallet) and spend crypto or convert crypto to cash without selling on an exchange.
The only crypto wallet app you need to take control of your assets.

BRD is a non_custodial mobile wallet that lets you buy, store, sell, swap, and stake crypto. BRD is available on mobile for iOS and Android platforms and includes several security features like pin code, biometric security, and a 12 word seed phrase. It's simple design will please even complete beginners. BRD's centralized exchange allows users to buy, sell, and swap a large variety of popular coins and altcoins. However, BRD doesn't offer a connected debit card to spend crypto gains or the ability to buy gift cards within the app.  Unlike PlasBit and Coinbase wallets, you may not connect any multiple wallets within the app to manage all of your assets in one place.

The BRD wallet's simple design and industry_standard security features make it a reasonable option for crypto beginners that want to dabble in a variety of coins and tokens without any accounts, logins, or KYC.

The Coinbase Wallet is a non_custodial crypto wallet. It is separate from the Coinbase Exchange where you may buy, sell, and exchange crypto. It offers users the ability to buy, store, and exchange an impressive amount of digital assets including cryptocurrencies, tokens, and NFTs. You have the option to connect your Coinbase Wallet and buy/sell/transfer coins through the Coinbase's centralized exchange (with fees applied) or browse a number of decentralized exchanges like Uniswap, Sushiswap, and others. Similar to the PlasBit Wallet, you may connect multiple wallets in the app. The Coinbase debit card is currently on a waitlist, leaving no way to spend crypto directly from the Coinbase Wallet app.
The Coinbase Wallet can be good for users that want to explore the expansive  decentralized web for niche digital assets.

faqs.title: How much will it cost to transfer money with PlasBit?
faqs.text: The total fee will be deducted in addition to the transfer amount. Once you click to check the transfer details a 15 minutes time frame will start and the rate and fee will be held for You to see before your final confirmation to check that you are comfortable with it.

faqs.title: How long will an international payment take?
faqs.text: The majority of our money transfers are completed on the same day or the following day.Occasionally certain factors can affect the transfer completion date.You can keep track of the transfer progress and we'll keep you updated by email throughout the process.

faqs.title: Is there any limit on how much money I can send with PlasBit?
text: The amount you can transfer with PlasBit is unlimited. You can transfer up to $50,000 USD online per transaction (or currency equivalent) and a maximum of $300,000.00 USD for the last 30 days.
For larger amounts, you can contact our support and they can guide you through the transfer process to increase your limit.

faqs.title: Is my money safe and secure at PlasBit?
faqs.text: Cryptocurrencies markets are unregulated services which are not governed by any specific European regulatory framework (including MiFID). Nevertheless, Customer funds are ring-fenced and held in Tier 1 international banks, so your money is always safe and secure.

faqs.title: Which countries can I send money to?
faqs.text: There are more than 130 countries and territories you can send to using PlasBit. To see which countries you can send to, simply start sending money or estimating fees.

faqs.title: What payment methods can I use to fund my wallet?
faqs.text: Currently you can fund your wallet with five major cryptocurrencies - Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDC, Cardano and Litecoin.

title: Ticket
You can contact our support service at any time to ask a question or get help in solving a problem.

creditCard.title: Payment confirmation

rules.title: Funding your account with a bank card is fast and easy. Just follow a few simple rules.
rules: -Your daily funding cannot exceed $8,000 in any currency or currencies.
-Plastic card only.We do not accept virtual cards.
-Only cards in your name.We do not accept anonimus cards.
-Only cards issued in the country of your profile address.
-You can use different cards, but not more than 2 cards every 60 days.
-We do not accept physically damaged cards.

verification.title: Verification
text: We need to verify all the cards that you will be using. This verification is a simple check we are required to do under commonly accepted card payment security practices.
Please complete the verification within 72 hours. After that , your incomplete deposit transaction will be dropped.

howWork.title: How does verification work?
text: -When you first use a card, we email you asking to kindly do a few simple things.
-After avery thing is done, deposit with this card will no longer require this check.
-If you use a new card, we will need to verify it to.

whatNeed.title: What will need?
text: -The card you are using for the deposit.
-A photo ID.
-A modern digital camera or a smartphone.

steps.title: What are the steps?
text: -We send you the instruction email.
-You take a few photos and upload them using the link in the email.
-We check your photos.
-If things are OK,your deposit completes automatically.

ifDont.title: What if I don't complete this verification?
text: -Your card deposit will be canceled.
-Your bank will unblock the pre-authorised amount on your card within 3-14 business days. In some banks it may take longer. Please contact your bank for further details.

alert: Transactions are monitored by compliance department.
Please note that we may request additional documents from you to confirm your deposit.
